constituent: yellow, salad, sprout, shoot, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: The salad did not look very appetizing... The sprouts were yellow and there were animal legs sticking out of it.
koohiiStory2: I order a salad with sprouts. I´m asked if I´d like to add chicken. Yes please. My salad then arrives . . . . topped with these horribly gnarled yellow things. Chicken feet! (animal legs) ugh.
readingExamples: 黄葉 (こうよう), 黄 (き)
words:
黄金(おうごん): gold
黄色(おうしょく): yellow
黄色(きいろ): the color yellow (noun)
黄色い(きいろい): yellow
